definition: to close/to stop up/to shut/to obstruct

sentences.english: It usually first appears in young chil…
sentences.chinese: 自闭症通常首先出现在幼儿时期。

sentences.english: Experts long believed that autistics lack imagination and introspection.
sentences.chinese: 专家一向认为，自闭症患者缺乏想像及自省。

sentences.english: The effects of oxytocin nasal spray are not limited to those with autism either.
sentences.chinese: 催生素鼻喷雾剂的效用不仅仅限于自闭症。

sentences.english: He suffered from severe autism and still wore nappies.
sentences.chinese: 他患有严重的自闭症，甚至要使用尿片。

sentences.english: Nick, diagnosed with ASD, is the inspiration for MacNeil's six-part series.
sentences.chinese: 这个自闭症节目的灵感正是诊断为ASD症的尼克。

sentences.english: But we also know that autism is complicated, just like our son.
sentences.chinese: 然而我们也知道自闭症很复杂，就像我们的儿子。

sentences.english: This suggests that MMR isn't linked to autism.
sentences.chinese: 这提示MMR与自闭症没有联系。

sentences.english: The experts advise parents to receive training for dealing with autism.
sentences.chinese: 专家建议父母接受相应的训练来应付自闭症。

sentences.english: Autism is an environmental illness -- at least in some cases.
sentences.chinese: 在有些案例中，自闭症是由于环境因素导致的。

sentences.english: For example, children on the autism spectrum have a need for tactile stimuli.
sentences.chinese: 举例来说，自闭症儿童需要有触觉刺激。

sentences.english: The reserch result has been published on autism reserch.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果发表在《自闭症研究》期刊上。

sentences.english: because his son suffers from autism.
sentences.chinese: 因为他儿子患有自闭症。

sentences.english: Some people worry that the MMR vaccine might be linked to autism.
sentences.chinese: 有些人忧虑MMR疫苗与自闭症有关。

sentences.english: is to think that autism is a form of disorganisation.
sentences.chinese: 一般认为自闭症是一种紊乱的表现。

sentences.english: And about half of those sibling had speech qualities associated with the autism.
sentences.chinese: 约一半的兄妹曾经患有和语言素质有关的自闭症。

sentences.english: The child only needs to inherit one copy of the gene to have autism.
sentences.chinese: 小孩只要遗传到一个复制的基因，就可能得自闭症。

definition: see 阿斯佩爾格爾|阿斯佩尔格尔[A1 si1 pei4 er3 ge2 er3]
to contract (an illness)/to be afflicted with/to suffer from

pinyin: A1 er3 ci2 hai3 mo4 zheng4
